page.title: 20Park Spring's Estate.
page.content:
One of the other things that I do not like about the estate is that all the houses are painted the same colour.If people want to paint their houses a different colour they have to get permission and they have to pay for the paint themselves. My cousin goes to the Adventure Playground on the estate but she is not allowed to go to the Youth Club because they some times have a lot of trouble there.
CREDITS ======= The work for this block was produced by children in Class 3M of Middlefield School,Gainsborough and by children living in the villages covered by this block.
